attributes.action: Create some form of legislation limiting or guiding the prices of compulsary car insurance, especially for younger drivers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that the governemnt should have a greater influence on the price of car insurance to try and prevent the blatant age discrimination that is occuring at the moment. Due to my age and sex i have obviously been put into the "boy racer" bracket and thus I am being charged a ridiculous amount for my annual premiums.
